"This is important, you know. If you get fucked by your enemies,
and they let out their semen, you can learn their skills."
"However, there are some enemies which have no skills to offer you.
When you CAN learn a new skill from your enemy, a ★ will be displayed
by its HP bar. Try and keep an eye out for that."
"By the way, as you get raped by an enemy, you'll slowly
regain MP. This could be useful if you're in a pinch.
Just remember, though: if you orgasm, your MP will fall to zero."

in this place, but the demons had stolen it for themselves.
By defeating them, the power has become yours."

demons, you can gain the power left in various places, and get
stronger very quickly. So keep it up."

メッセージボックス作成.lsb

Event.EventArg: Suppose thou hath encountered a sinner.
The sinner grew up without knowing light or love,
and lived a life of poverty.
The sinner did much evil in his life, and tormented many.
If this sinner sayeth to thee:
"Bestow upon me all thy earthly possessions,
all thy goods, and the clothes on thy back.
If you do this, I shalt dedicate my life to good deeds, forevermore."

Label.Script: ノベルシステム\メッセージボックス\終了待ち.lsb

Param.Str: "I will punish the sinner for his misdeeds."

DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"But, if you back out and rest even a little bit,
or load a save, you'll be missing out."
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情普】普通.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0
[\x01]CHANGECG|顔色|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\ダミー.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","001★★★主人公.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")

DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"If you fight a lot of enemies, past a certain point, you achieve something
called a "multi-battle bonus". Fighting many enemies in a row can increase
item and G drop rates slightly, and you'll earn more EXP as well."
[\x01]CREATECG|サポート|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常閉じ目.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|50|0|0||1
"This bonus will go away if you rest at an inn.
It also resets if you load a save inside a dungeon.
So, try and fight as many enemies in a row as you can."
"But the bonus isn't a huge deal, so if you really need
the rest, then you're better off taking it.
Also, saving doesn't reset the bonus, no matter what. Just loading."
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情喜】元気.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","001★★★主人公.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")

things in the upper right corner there?"
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情普】普通.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0
[\x01]CHANGECG|顔色|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\ダミー.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0

DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"That's your multi-battle bonus. It goes up when you defeat an enemy.
The higher it is, the more items you get, the more G you earn,
and more EXP you gain when you defeat an enemy."
[\x01]CREATECG|サポート|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常閉じ目.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
"This bonus resets to zero if you stay at an inn.
It also resets if you load a save inside a dungeon.
So, if you savescum a lot, say goodbye to that bonus."
"That bonus doesn't make a huge difference, though,
so if you really need to rest, go right ahead.
Also, saving doesn't reset the bonus. Only loading."
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情喜】元気.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0
